details: Multiple failed login attempts detected from this IP. Pattern suggests automated login attempt using common username/password combinations.
SQL injection payloads detected in form submissions. Attack targeted the user authentication endpoint with various injection techniques.
Cross-site scripting attempts detected in comment fields. Attack attempted to inject malicious JavaScript code to steal user cookies.
Excessive API requests exceeding rate limits. Potential data scraping or DoS attempt targeting product information endpoints.
Path traversal attack detected attempting to access system files using ../ sequences. Attack specifically targeted configuration files.
Command injection attack detected in file upload feature. Attempted to execute shell commands on the server through specially crafted file names.
Attempted to upload files containing known malware signatures. Files were automatically quarantined by the security system.
Attempted to create phishing pages mimicking the login portal. Used similar styling but with modified form action to exfiltrate credentials.
IP identified as part of a botnet participating in a distributed denial of service attack against the authentication servers.
Credential stuffing attack detected. Multiple login attempts across different user accounts using credentials from known data breaches.
